entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening then light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
